content:
Under Constuction :) Resume Internships PlayStation – Software Engineer Intern My experience will be published on the Sony blog!
Snoonu – Software Engineer Intern Snoonu is a technology company focusing on e-commerce services. It is projected to be Qatar's first unicorn. I worked with .NET and Apache Superset. Research & Teaching Undergraduate Research Assistant Supervised by Dan Garcia in the Berkeley ACE lab. CS 61A Head TA (Undergraduate Student Instructor) Summer 2022, Fall 2022 CS 61A TA (Undergraduate Student Instructor) Spring 2022 CS 61A Tutor Fall 2021 Advocacy ASUC Office of Academic Affairs – Director of Academic Planning I was appointed in the students' association to represent 45,000 students and focus on the long-term future of UC Berkeley's academics. United Nations – Youth Representative I was the youngest person invited and sponsored by the UN to attend Session 28 of the Commission on Crime Prevention and Criminal Justice (CCPCJ) in Vienna, Austria. I represented the youth voice through a speech that highlighted Sustainable Development Goal 16 (Peace, Justice and Strong Institutions). Report: E/CN.15/2019/15 Organizations Debate Society of Berkeley, Parliamentary Debate at Berkeley, BridgeUSA, Delta Gamma Sorority

title: Experience

content:
CS 61A Head uGSI Summer 2022 charlottele [at] berkeley [dot] edu
Labs M, W | 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM | Online Discussions Tu, Th | 8:00 PM - 9:30 PM | Online Office Hours W | 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM | Online
F | 1:00 PM - 3:00 PM | Cory 521 Links Attendance Form: go.cs61a.org/char-attend Anonymous Feedback Form: go.cs61a.org/char-anon 1-on-1 Advising Appointments: go.cs61a.org/char-advice Join Lab Queue: go.cs61a.org/char-help View Lab Queue: go.cs61a.org/char-queue Logistics Please fill out this form if you’re missing any points. I will award everything this weekend. All points should be up to date by Monday, August 8. Attendance Discussion The secret word will be given at the end of section. You must attend the entire section. Your attendance status will be verified with the Zoom meeting data. Lab The secret word will be given towards the beginning of section. You can use this time to work on the lab assignment and ask any questions. If you complete the lab assignment before section, you can submit your okpy link as the secret word for credit. Contact Please use Piazza or office hours for debugging and general logistical questions. I’m happy to respond to emails, but there are almost 100 students enrolled in my section so it’s a bit difficult. Emails should generally be reserved for personal or section-specific matters. Dozens of staff monitor Piazza all day, so you’ll recieve a much faster response there. Weekly Material & Guides Google Drive
Discussion 11 Videos Make sure video quality is set to the highest. Introduction to Regex link Q1-Q2 (Regex) link
